name: TimelineEntryRelevance
desc: An object that describes the relative importance of a timeline entry compared to other entries in the current and past timelines.

items.name: init(score: Float, duration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates an object that represents the importance of a widget and the length of time for WidgetKit to consider it for rotation to the top of the stack.
